snippet: The BankAmerica Corporation said yesterday that it would close 532 branches, or about one-third of its total, as it continues to consolidate after acquiring the Security Pacific Corporation. The $4 billion merger, which took place in April, was th...
lead_paragraph: The BankAmerica Corporation said yesterday that it would close 532 branches, or about one-third of its total, as it continues to consolidate after acquiring the Security Pacific Corporation. The $4 billion merger, which took place in April, was the biggest in banking history and made BankAmerica the nation's No. 2 banking company in asset size after Citicorp.

headline.main: BANKAMERICA PLANS TO SHUT A THIRD OF BRANCHES
